וְהָיָה֮ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- shall be when יֶחֱטָ֣א <WH2398> ye-che-Ta Then it shall be because he hath sinned וְאָשֵׁם֒ <WH816> ve-'a-Shem and is guilty וְהֵשִׁ֨יב <WH7725> ve-he-Shiv that he shall restore אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַגְּזֵלָ֜ה <WH1497> hag-ge-ze-Lah which he took violently away אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what גָּזָ֗ל <WH1497> ga-Zal, robbery א֤וֹ <WH176> o or אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעֹ֙שֶׁק֙ <WH6233> ha-'O-shek or the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what עָשָׁ֔ק <WH6231> 'a-Shak, which he hath deceitfully gotten א֚וֹ <WH176> o or אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַפִּקָּד֔וֹן <WH6487> hap-pik-ka-Don, the deposit אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָפְקַ֖ד <WH6487> ha-fe-Kad the deposit אִתּ֑וֹ <WH853> it-To; א֥וֹ <WH176> o or אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֲבֵדָ֖ה <WH9> ha-'a-ve-Dah or the lost thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מָצָֽא׃ <WH4672> ma-Tza. which he found

א֠וֹ <WH176> o or מִכֹּ֞ל <WH3605> mik-Kol anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יִשָּׁבַ֣ע <WH7650> yish-sha-Va' Or all that about which he hath sworn עָלָיו֮ <WH5921> 'a-Lav and לַשֶּׁקֶר֒ <WH8267> lash-she-Ker falsely וְשִׁלַּ֤ם <WH7999> ve-shil-Lam he shall even restore אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To בְּרֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> be-ro-Sho, it in the principal וַחֲמִשִׁתָ֖יו <WH2549> va-cha-mi-shi-Tav the fifth part יֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> yo-Sef more עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav; to the one לַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> la-'a-Sher to whom ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu he ל֛וֹ lo יִתְּנֶ֖נּוּ <WH5414> yit-te-Nen-nu thereto [and] give בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom it unto him to whom it appertaineth in the day אַשְׁמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH819> ash-ma-To. of his trespass offering
